mapper.sql: gr_id, gt_id, give_type, money, number, upperLmit AS upperLmit, id, busId , ctId
mapper.select: select gr_id, grgs.gt_id as gId, give_type, money, number, upperLmit,gt.gt_name,gt.gt_unit from t_member_giverulegoodstype grgs inner join t_member_goodstype gt on gt.gt_id=grgs.gt_id where gr_id=#{grId} and give_type!=2
mapper.delete: delete from t_member_giverulegoodstype where busId=#{busId} and ctId=#{ctId}
